content: dtr treble_crochet turn 10 chain 4 this is your first stitch in the same stitch make 2 treble_crochet s double_crochet s treble_crochet double_crochet in the next 3 sts make 2 treble_crochet s double_crochet s in the chain 2 space chain 2 miss the next 2 sts * treble_crochet double_crochet in the next 4 sts make 2 treble_crochet s double_crochet s in the chain 2 space chain 2 miss 2 sts * repeat from * to * twice more treble_crochet double_crochet in the next 4 sts in the centre chain 2 space make the following 2 treble_crochet s double_crochet s chain 2 2 treble_crochet s double_crochet s treble_crochet double_crochet in the next 4 sts * chain 2 miss the next 2 sts make 2 treble_crochet s double_crochet s in the next chain 2 space treble_crochet double_crochet in the next 4 sts* repeat from * to * twice more chain 2 miss the next 2 sts make 2 treble_crochet s double_crochet s in the next chain 2 space treble_crochet double_crochet in the next 3 sts in the last st make 2 treble_crochet s double_crochet s and 1 dtr treble_crochet turn from now on you just repeat row 9 and 10 but add in the extra repeats you will see its an easy pattern to pick up but just incase i have included on the next page a list of row numbers and with the amount of repeats for each row to help i managed 55 row in total i ended after making a repeat of row 9 make sure you also do the same 11 repeat row 9 add in 3 repeats 12 repeat row 10 add in 3 repeats 13 repeat row 9 add in 4 repeats 14 repeat row 10 add in 4 repeats 15 repeat row 9 add in 5 repeats 16 repeat row 10 add in 5 repeats 17 repeat row 9 add in 6 repeats 18 repeat row 10 add in 6 repeats 19 repeat row 9 add in 7 repeats 20 repeat row 10 add in 7 repeats 21 repeat row 9 add in 8 repeats 22 repeat row 10 add in 8 repeats 23 repeat row 9 add in 9 repeats 24 repeat row 10 add in 9 repeats 25 repeat row 9 add in 10 repeats 26 repeat row 10 add in 10 repeats 27 repeat row 9 add in 11 repeats 28 repeat row 10 add in 11 repeats 29 repeat row 9 add in 12 repeats 30 repeat row 10 add in 12 repeats 31 repeat row 9 add in 13 repeats 32 repeat row 10 add in 13 repeats 33 repeat row 9 add in 14 repeats 34 repeat row 10 add in 14 repeats 35 repeat row 9 add in 15 repeats 36 repeat row 10 add in 15 repeats 37 repeat row 9 add in 16 repeats 38 repeat row 10 add in 16 repeats 39 repeat row 9 add in 17 repeats 40 repeat row 10 add in
